issue.title: com.healthapplines.healthsense.bloodsugarhub
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.67

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.healthapplines.healthsense.bloodsugarhub

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

issue.title: www.hs-kempten.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hs-kempten.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hs-kempten.de%2F) ### Comment > With adguard the website don't react to any click. The scrolling works, but impossible to click. Without adguard and after CTRL+F5 I saw cookie-notification, I agreed with necessary cookies and after that it works and let me to make click and choose filters. ### Screenshots
